content: this delicate lacy shawl can be made in a variety of sizes and colors from extra-small through extra-large the sizes provided can fit a very young flower girl through larger members of the bridal party with over 150 colors to choose from palette yarn is guaranteed to have a shade to coordinate with your chosen wedding colors the bridesmaid shawl is worked top down from the back of the neck with increasing done at the sides and the center spine a simple 6-row repeat can be done a variable number of times to create different sizes the net and picot-scalloped lower edging set off the lacework making this an elegant heirloom shawl to treasure
